title: PHPfunctionKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPfunctionKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Create a function and run it:
<?php
function hello($a) {
return "Hello $a!";
}
echo hello("World");
?>

Definition and Usage
The
function
keyword is used to create a function.
Related Pages
Read more about functions in our
PHP Functions Tutorial
.

★
+1
